mapper.sql:
q.guid, q.jobid, q.jobname, q.owneruserguid, (select u.username from sa_user u where u.guid = q.owneruserguid) ownerusername, q.jobstatus, q.executorclass, q.issinglethread, q.jobtype, q.priority, q.executresult, q.serverid, q.jobgroup, q.createuserguid, q.updateuserguid, q.fileguid,
q.createtime, q.updatetime,
q.description, q.fielda, q.fieldb, q.fieldc, q.fieldd, q.fielde, q.fieldf, q.fieldg, q.fieldh, q.fieldi, q.fieldj, q.fieldk, q.fieldl, q.fieldm, q.fieldn, q.fieldo
mapper.select: select count(guid) cn from sa_job_queue q

select from sa_job_queue q
order by $ORDERBY$
ORDER BY Q.UPDATETIME DESC

select q.*, (select u.username from sa_user u where u.guid = q.owneruserguid) ownerusername from sa_job_queue q where 1 = 1
order by $ORDERBY$
ORDER BY Q.UPDATETIME DESC

select q.*, count(1) over() rowcount$$ from sa_job_queue q where 1 = 1
and jobtype = #JOBTYPE#
and createuserguid = #CREATEUSERGUID#
and 1 = 2
and $LISTJOBSTATUS$
order by $ORDERBY$
ORDER BY q.UPDATETIME DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into sa_job_queue (guid, jobid, jobname, owneruserguid, jobstatus, executorclass, issinglethread, jobtype, priority, executresult, fileguid,
description, fielda, fieldb, fieldc, fieldd, fielde, fieldf, fieldg, fieldh, fieldi,
fieldj, fieldk, fieldl, fieldm, fieldn, fieldo, serverid, jobgroup, createuserguid, createtime, updateuserguid, updatetime ) values (#GUID#, #JOBID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #JOBNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #OWNERUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #JOBSTATUS:NUMERIC#, #EXECUTORCLASS:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISSINGLETHREAD:VARCHAR:NULL#, #JOBTYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #PRIORITY:NUMERIC#, #EXECUTRESULT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FILEGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#DESCRIPTION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDA:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDB:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDC:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDD:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDF:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDG:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDH:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDI:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#FIELDJ:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDK:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDL:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDM:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDN:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDO:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SERVERID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #JOBGROUP:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# )
mapper.update:
update sa_job_queue
updateuserguid = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, updatetime = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, jobid=#JOBID#, jobname=#JOBNAME#, owneruserguid=#OWNERUSERGUID#, jobstatus=#JOBSTATUS#, executorclass=#EXECUTORCLASS#,
issinglethread=#ISSINGLETHREAD#, jobtype=#JOBTYPE#, priority=#PRIORITY#, excutresult=#EXCUTRESULT#, description=#DESCRIPTION#, fileguid=#FILEGUID#,
fielda=#FIELDA#, fieldb=#FIELDB#, fieldc=#FIELDC#, fieldd=#FIELDD#, fielde=#FIELDE#, fieldf=#FIELDF#, fieldg=#FIELDG#, fieldh=#FIELDH#, fieldi=#FIELDI#, fieldj=#FIELDJ#, fieldk=#FIELDK#, fieldl=#FIELDL#, fieldm=#FIELDM#, fieldn=#FIELDN#, fieldo=#FIELDO#, serverid=#SERVERID#,
where guid = #GUID#
mapper.delete: delete from sa_job_queue where JOBTYPE = #JOBTYPE# and jobstatus in ($LISTJOBSTATUS$) and createtime <=#CURRENTDATE:TIMESTAMP#
